data.text: @Daily_Record It’s one rule for us and another rule for the posh pricks , golden balls can afford fine, he can even afford ban and hire chauffeur

@Daily_Record So apparently the ‘date stamp’ was a day late. Could someone in our large/well-paid/expert media ask, whose was the date stamp? (And ps if Beckham wants to do the right thing, he should voluntarily pay the fine anyway...he can afford it.)
